intro: Ackama celebica, commonly known as the Celebes ackama, is a flowering plant native to the Moluccas in Indonesia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, clustered in umbels, and are fragrant. Ackama celebica is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
